name: The Unity Days
description:
The Unity Day is a story-driven pseudo-JRPG game with a unique combat system. The story follows a boy named Finley. On one rainy day while helping out a beast man, Mr. Rustle, a lightning strike occurred and Mr. Rustle turned pitch black, glowing with an ominous aura and chased Finley out of the city. Team up with friends from various different fantasy races in order to defeat enemies and discover the truth behind this curse that has been put on the world to return everyone back to normal!

For a detailed how-to-play guide, please download the manual, as a tutorial is not yet ready.
